scripts.bundle: parcel build src/CurveComposer.js --out-dir build/ --out-file CurveComposer.js --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-source-maps --no-minify --experimental-scope-hoisting  --public-url ./
scripts.mini: parcel build src/CurveComposer.js --out-dir build/ --out-file CurveComposer.min.js --target node --bundle-node-modules --no-source-maps --experimental-scope-hoisting  --public-url ./
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run mini
